page.title: 20A Day in the Life of Oscar
page.content: Oscar gets up in time to watch Breakfast Television then he has his breakfast of Frosties, milk and coffee. At school he first reads a novel for half an hour then does maths. Next comes atlas work. At playtime Oscar plays football with his mates. The girls go in huddles and talk. When he goes back to school he writes a poem. Then everybody goes down to drama (Oscar enjoys that). Now Oscar goes down to the dinner hall. It's corned beef and potatoes. Then he goes back to school and does his project. Oscar is doing cooking. Today it's Chinese Cooking. When Oscar gets home, he settles down to watch television. After tea he plays in the garden then he goes to bed at 9.30p.m..
